title: Every American Horror Story Season RANKED
author: WatchMojo.com
comment: Did anyone else really really like Apocalypse? Thought it was really cool how they brought the witches back, visited the hotel and the murder house. I loved it
Lily Rabe as Sister Mary Eunice was the true star of Asylum.

watchmojo: "We'll try to keep spoilers to a minimum."
...seconds later: "I killed daddy."
American Horror Story was not the same anymore after Jessica Lange left!!!
Evan Peters is one of the most underrated actors in my opinion. He is so good in anything he does and yes he does work a lot but he definitely deserves more notoriety than he gets.
description:
With 1984 on the horizon, it’s time to go through all the American Horror Story seasons… ranked from best to worst. We’re basing our picks on which seasons took the most chances, which had the most memorable ensembles, and of course, which offered the most jump out of your seat moments. We’ll try to keep spoilers to a minimum for those who haven’t seen the show, but we will have to delve into a few key plot points. WatchMojo ranks all the American Horror Story seasons. Which AHS season is your favorite? Let us know in the comments!
